ruleToc.chapterList:
<js>
  flag=source.getVariable()=="1"?true:false
  let $ = JSON.parse(String(result))
  let array = []
  $.data.vs.forEach((booklet) => {
    array.push({ 
    	    name:String(booklet.vN),
    	    voltype:true
    	 })
    booklet.cs.forEach((chapter) => {
    	  vip = chapter.sS!="1"?"🔒":""
    	  href = `https://vipreader.qidian.com/chapter/`+baseUrl.match(/bookId=(\d+)/)[1]+`/`+chapter.id+`/`;
    	  href=flag?href+",{'webView': true}":href
      array.push({
        name: String(vip+chapter.cN),
        url: href,
        time:"更新时间:"+String(chapter.uT)+"  字数:"+String(chapter.cnt),
        voltype:false
      })
    })
  })
  array
</js>

bookSourceComment: 真实网站名称：爱下电子书 【秋：我强迫症】

ruleBookInfo.author: b
ruleBookInfo.init:
<js>(()=>{
let bk=JSON.parse(java.getZipStringContent(result,'detail.json')).data;
return {
a:bk.name,
b:bk.author,
c:java.timeFormat(new Date(bk.chapterUpdateTime).getTime()),
d:bk.wordNum,
e:bk.chapterName,
f:bk.intro,
g:bk.picture
};
})()
</js>

ruleContent.content: #content@tag.p@textNodes##本章未完，请点击下一页.*|喜欢.*请大家收藏.*|本章尚未.*继续阅读！|\u3000+第[^\d].*

ruleBookInfo.author: $.author_name
ruleBookInfo.init:
<js>
var javaImport = new JavaImporter();
javaImport.importPackage(
    Packages.java.lang,
    Packages.javax.crypto.spec,
    Packages.javax.crypto,
    Packages.android.util
);

with(javaImport){
    function decrypt(str){
        var key=SecretKeySpec(String("ZKYm5vSUhvcG9IbXNZTG1pb2").getBytes(),"DESede");
        var iv=IvParameterSpec(String("01234567").getBytes());
        var bytes=Base64.decode(String(str).getBytes(),2);
        var chipher=Cipher.getInstance("DESede/CBC/PKCS5Padding");
        chipher.init(2,key,iv);
        return String(chipher.doFinal(bytes));
    }
}
decrypt(JSON.parse(result).data.replace(/(\r\n)|(\n)|(\r)/g,''))
</js>result
ruleBookInfo.name: $.book_name

ruleContent.content:
<js>
var javaImport = new JavaImporter();
javaImport.importPackage(
    Packages.java.lang,
    Packages.javax.crypto.spec,
    Packages.javax.crypto,
    Packages.android.util
);

with(javaImport){
    function decrypt(str){
        var key=SecretKeySpec(String("ZKYm5vSUhvcG9IbXNZTG1pb2").getBytes(),"DESede");
        var iv=IvParameterSpec(String("01234567").getBytes());
        var bytes=Base64.decode(String(str).getBytes(),2);
        var chipher=Cipher.getInstance("DESede/CBC/PKCS5Padding");
        chipher.init(2,key,iv);
        return String(chipher.doFinal(bytes));
    }
}
decrypt(JSON.parse(result).data.replace(/(\r\n)|(\n)|(\r)/g,''))
</js>content##【.*咪咪阅读.*】

ruleSearch.bookUrl:
<js>
var bid=parseInt(java.getString('$.bookId'));
if(!bid>0){
bid=parseInt(java.getString('$.id'));
}
java.put("bid",bid);
var subpath=parseInt((1999+bid)/2000);
var url="http://statics.rungean.com/static/book/zip/"+subpath+"/"+bid+".zip";
result=url;</js>

chapter_new_name
<js>result.replace(/^(\d+)、第.+章/,'第$1章').replace(/^(\d+)、\d+、/,'第$1章 ').replace(/^(\d+)、\d+/,'第$1章').replace(/^(第.+章)\s?\d+/,'$1').replace(/^(\d+)、/,'第$1章 ').replace(/^(第.+章)\s?第.+章/,'$1').replace(/第\s(.+)\s章/,'第$1章').replace(/.*(chapter|Chapter)\s?(\d+)\s?/,'$1 $2 ').replace(/\(.+\)/,'').replace(/……/,'')</js>
##(?<=）).+

ruleToc.chapterList:
<js>
var javaImport = new JavaImporter();
javaImport.importPackage(
    Packages.java.lang,
    Packages.javax.crypto.spec,
    Packages.javax.crypto,
    Packages.android.util
);

with(javaImport){
    function decrypt(str){
        var key=SecretKeySpec(String("ZKYm5vSUhvcG9IbXNZTG1pb2").getBytes(),"DESede");
        var iv=IvParameterSpec(String("01234567").getBytes());
        var bytes=Base64.decode(String(str).getBytes(),2);
        var chipher=Cipher.getInstance("DESede/CBC/PKCS5Padding");
        chipher.init(2,key,iv);
        return String(chipher.doFinal(bytes));
    }
}
decrypt(JSON.parse(result).data.replace(/(\r\n)|(\n)|(\r)/g,''))
</js>result

<js>result.replace(/^(\d+)、第.+章/,'第$1章').replace(/^(\d+)、\d+、/,'第$1章 ').replace(/^(\d+)、\d+/,'第$1章').replace(/^(第.+章)\s?\d+/,'$1').replace(/^(\d+)、/,'第$1章 ').replace(/^(第.+章)\s?第.+章/,'$1').replace(/第\s(.+)\s章/,'第$1章').replace(/.*(chapter|Chapter)\s?(\d+)\s?/,'$1 $2 ').replace(/\(.+\)/,'').replace(/……/,'')</js>
